name: Spawn Of Parzelon
resist: cold; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.name: Devil's Sight
text: Magical darkness doesn't impede the spawn's darkvision.

trait.name: Keen Smell
text: The spawn has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: The spawn has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
text: The spawn has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the spawn's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

trait.name: Pounce
text: If the spawn moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the spawn can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
text: The spawn of parzelon's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Multiattack
text: The spawn of Parzelon makes one bite attack and two claw attacks.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.

action.name: Tranquil Roar (Recharge 4-6)
text: The spawn emits a dreadfully alluring purr.
Each creature within 20 feet of it that can hear it and that isn't a devil must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be charmed for 1 minute.
A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
